articles.author: Robert Frank
articles.title: More rich Americans are opening Swiss bank accounts fearing U.S. risks - CNBC
articles.description: Swiss banks say they have seen a surge of interest and business from high-net-worth Americans opening investment accounts in recent months.
articles.content: A version of this article first appeared in CNBC's Inside Wealth newsletter with Robert Frank, a weekly guide to the high-net-worth investor and consumer. Sign up to receive future editions, straight… [+185 chars]
